commit_list.message: Fix cached graph out-of-sync when checking.
Log ignore_balances on cached graph differences.
Remove unneeded language selector help message.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:rfugger/villagescc

Conflicts:
	cc/feed/templates/feed_base.html
	cc/feed/templates/feed_item_list.html

Merge pull request #15 from r000n/staging

Merge r000n's i18n improvements.
Fix bug where new node might not be in cached graph.
Fix typo on title attribute of trusted user heart.
Fix bug where updating cached graphs blows up on newly-created creditline with no partner creditline yet.
Add LOCALE_PATHS setting to avoid warning.
Load cached graph in verify cached graphs tool if not already present.
Fix cached graph verifier tool to handle case where no graph is cached ATM.
Utility to verify cached flow graphs.
Don't crash on resize if image file not present.
Slight efficiency boost to loading flow graph.
Load 3rd-party javascript with protocol-relative URLs (fixes insecure google maps js).
Only send error emails on errors, not warnings (like 404).
Bad trans tag; fixed unicode handling in post contact view.
When a profile is deleted, delete related nodes, creditlines, and accounts in Ripple backend.
Fixed bad trans tag in post template.
Auto-generate secret key if not present.
Decouple secret key from settings file in repo.
Make sure [Offer] or [Want] appears at end of post title.
Quick fix for Node not in graph problem.
Delete password reset link after use; more info on reg form.
Expand initial radius to give a bunch of posts to new users.
Emails to inviter/sharer when someone signs up.
User Sender SMTP header for SenderID/DKIM/SPF validation.
Change mail to handle DKIM/SenderID validation; beginning of send newsletter from admin.
Fix bug in confirm box for trusted acknowledge.
Give 5 hearts to give out before any endorsement.
Missed spots for rename settings -> edit_settings.
Bold number of hearts in endorsement phrase on profile page.
Fix node where it should be user.
Show all posts by default so there's something there when you arrive.
Case-insensitive unique username check on registration.
View post message in post contact email.
Message about invitation link on invitation request page.
Link to sender profile in contact email.
"Search All" in top search input; clicking on user thumbnail takes you to their profile.
Fix bug comparing user id to profile id on profile endorsements page.
Email on 404; 404 on wrong payment id.
Re-order about section to put motivation at top.
Hide last_login date for now, since it is not the last online time.
Email in invitation sent user message; distinguish required form fields.
Privacy about anonymous visitors and search engines.
Email envelope-from = web@villages.cc, header from = sender, for SPF pass.
Turn off autoescaping in email templates.
Add info@villages.cc as admin address, mention on feedback page.
Rename feed initial sql fixture so it works with syncdb.
Better payment transactions; fixed buggy relationships table.
Last easy todos before initial deployment.
More on how it works; nicer contact form display.
Invitations convert to endorsements; delete used invites.
Move static and uploads dirs to project root.  Add dummy file in uploads so it will be in git.
More feed filter fixes; delete post; post image margin.
Many tweaks; some better copy; don't apply sticky/default filter prefs to unfiltered feeds.
Handle instruction inputs that are held over as input values across page reloads.
Add info message about new email confirmation.
Move email and endorsement_limited fields from profile to settings table.
Add static pages app; refactor base template to allow for pages with no subnav.
Some intro text; request invitation form (incomplete).
Rename change email form to settings form.
Make entry creation safe with concurrent transactions.
Relationships summary on profile info page; trusted indicator on profile posts and endorsements.
Relationships page improvements, including trusted balance.
Handle endorsement delete -> ripple backend, Profile.trusted_profiles.
Fix some stuff for anonymous browsing.
Auto-clear input help text on form submit.
Clear feed filter search query; fix no radius searches.
Search/filter in feed.  Radius and trusted not quite wired up yet.
Feed items clickable everywhere (search, my posts, etc.).
Show other profile in other's posts.
Show sent and received entries on payment.
Other user balance on profile sidebar.
Overall balance on home sidebar; trusted endorsements on other user profile sidebar.
Tweaks to locator; highlight selected feed filter.
Map locations stay across form errors and reloads in locator.
Shorter feed item summaries, with individual item pages for everything (not complete); improved locator.
Profile_image_url templatetag to clean up profile image display.
Proper invalidation for cached network reputation.
Integrate search, edit, new post, etc. into layout; feed filter.
Three-col layout. Still no feed filters.
Nav highlighting; keep query when switching search type.
Profile search; search index creation working.
Set location on registration, no email validation, auto-login.
Fix up max payment calculation and entry order.
Perform flow calculations only with integers; use multigraph.
Random multigraph tests on custom mincost.
Modify mincost code to allow arbitrary graph edge names.
Integrate new min_cost_flow code with payment flow graph module.
Add my own min cost flow implementation, since networkx's is broken.
More payment tests; fix bug when capacity=0.
Remove promise app entry from cc.urls.
Merge promise app into relate app.
Merge endorse app into relate app.
Simplify some flow stuff, change flow edge weighting model to hopefully avoid loops.
Discovering and fixing a few bugs in payment process.
Proxy class for entries; better entry display.
Submit payment form, create payment feed item.  Payment not working right yet.
Initial code for payment submit.  Not tested or quite complete.
Factor base tests into ripple module for use in payment module.
Ripple apps account and payment, initial checkin.
Load feed item objects; new post link from feed; title and image fields from post model.
Subnav title is profile name for profile pages.
Initial rough feed display; page title in subnav.
Initial commit: rough endorsements, no promises yet, no Ripple backend.

repo_list.description: sourcecode of ripplepay.com, till now under svn, I'm putting it under git.
